TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MenuCommandService extends System.Object implements class System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService, class System.IDisposable
Public Class MenuCommandService Implements IDisposable, IMenuCommandService

summary.span: 实现 接口。

span.span: Implements the interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类实现接口，是用于为菜单命令添加处理程序以及定义谓词的托管的接口。The class implements the interface, which is the managed interface used to add handlers for menu commands and to define verbs. 类自动提供由包类以提供全局命令对于整个包，并且它还提供通过`Microsoft.VisualStudio.Shell.WindowPane`类提供当前窗口的命令。The class is automatically offered by the package class to offer global commands for an entire package, and it is also offered by the `Microsoft.VisualStudio.Shell.WindowPane` class to offer commands for the current window. 此产品始终通过服务容器中，因此任何人都派生自包或窗口窗格类可以删除或替换的默认实现接口。This offering is always done through the service container, so anyone deriving from the package or window pane classes can remove or replace the default implementation of the interface. 类利用了一些其他服务。The class utilizes several other services. 所有这些服务都是可选的因此行为类降低如果一个或多个服务缺失。All of these services are optional, so the behavior of the class degrades if one or more services are missing. 下表显示使用的服务及其用途。The following table shows which services are used and for what purpose. |服务Service|目标Purpose| |-------------|-------------| ||用于发现当前所选内容以获取由当前所选的设计器提供的谓词。Used to discover the current selection in order to obtain verbs offered by the currently selected designer.| ||用于获取的设计器当前所选的组件，如果有的话。Used to obtain the designer for the currently selected component, if any.| |`Microsoft.VisualStudio.Shell.Interop.IVsUIShell`|用于通知的命令状态已更改的 Visual Studio。Used to notify Visual Studio that the command status has changed.| |`Microsoft.VisualStudio.Shell.Interop.IOleComponentUIManager`|用于显示上下文菜单。Used to show context menus.|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果该服务是否与设计器中，使用`serviceProvider`参数应为的服务提供程序设计器中，这与情况相同。If the service is being used with a designer, the `serviceProvider` parameter should be the service provider for the designer, as is the case with .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void AddCommand(class System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand command) cil managed
Public Overridable Sub AddCommand (command As MenuCommand)

span.span: The to add.

summary.span: 将命令处理程序添加到菜单命令服务。

span.span: Adds a command handler to the menu command service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将是命令处理程序添加到菜单命令服务。The method adds a command handler to the menu command service. 命令处理程序未定义文本、 快捷键或菜单项的放置。Command handlers do not define the text, shortcut, or placement of a menu item. 相反，如果单击项定义菜单项的行为。Rather, they define the menu item’s behavior if the item is clicked.

span.span: is .
A command handler already exists.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void AddVerb(class System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb verb) cil managed
Public Overridable Sub AddVerb (verb As DesignerVerb)

span.span: The to add.

summary.span: 将谓词添加到 的谓词表中。

span.span: Adds a verb to the verb table of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此谓词均可用而不考虑当前选择何种设计。This verb is available regardless of what designer is currently selected. 与菜单命令、 不同谓词可以定义将向用户，显示的文本，但并不实际的菜单上定义命令的位置。Unlike menu commands, verbs can define the text that is displayed to the user, but they do not define the placement of the command on the actual menu.

span.span: is .

summary.span: 释放由 使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed

summary.span: 释放由 使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在完成使用 后，应调用 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法使 处于不可用状态。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 在调用，必须释放对所有引用以便垃圾回收器才能回收的内存，占用。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法称为由公共`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当`disposing`参数为 true 时，此方法释放由任何托管对象持有的全部资源此引用。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 在重写请注意不要引用已释放的以前调用中的对象。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 有关详细信息和，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[重写 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool GlobalInvoke(class System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID commandID) cil managed

span.span: The command to invoke.

summary.span: 在本地窗体上或全局环境中调用给定命令。

span.span: Invokes the given command on the local form or in the global environment.

returns.span: 如果找到了命令，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: , if the command was found; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在本地窗体是首先搜索给定的命令 id。The local form is first searched for the given command ID. 如果找到，则调用它。If it is found, it is invoked. 否则，命令 ID 将传递给全局环境命令处理程序中，如果有的话。Otherwise, the command ID is passed to the global environment command handler, if one is available.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool GlobalInvoke (System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID commandId, object arg);

span.span: The command to invoke.
A parameter for the invocation.

summary.span: 在本地窗体上或全局环境中调用具有给定参数的给定命令。

span.span: Invokes the given command with the given parameter on the local form or in the global environment.

returns.span: 如果找到了命令，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: , if the command was found; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在本地窗体是首先搜索给定的命令 id。The local form is first searched for the given command ID. 如果找到，则调用它。If it is found, it is invoked. 否则，命令 ID 将传递给全局环境命令处理程序中，如果有的话。Otherwise, the command ID is passed to the global environment command handler, if one is available.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event MenuCommandsChanged As MenuCommandsChangedEventHandler

summary.span: 当菜单命令的状态更改时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the status of a menu command has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnCommandsChanged(class System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandsChangedEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnCommandsChanged (e As MenuCommandsChangedEventArgs)

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 其状态已更改时，菜单命令调用方法。The method is called by a menu command when its status has changed. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在重写在派生类中，一定要调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s method so that registered delegates receive the event.

span.span: Shows the shortcut menu with the given command ID at the given location.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认实现不执行任何操作。The default implementation does nothing.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property Verbs As DesignerVerbCollection

summary.span: 获取当前可用的设计器谓词的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of the designer verbs that are currently available.

value.span: 当前可用的设计器谓词的 。

span.span: A of the designer verbs that are currently available.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性提供的谓词的集合。The property provides a collection of verbs. 这些谓词来自两个位置：These verbs come from two places: - 通过添加的谓词方法。Verbs added through the method of . - 由当前所选的设计器提供的谓词。Verbs offered by the currently selected designer. 谓词添加到此服务通过方法称为全局谓词，因为它们适用于此服务，但通常没有此服务为每个工具或文档窗口的一个实例。Verbs added to this service through the method are called global verbs because they are global to this service, but generally there is one instance of this service for each tool or document window. 通过查询的服务提供程序获得设计器谓词和。Designer verbs are obtained by querying the service provider for and . 如果选择服务提供为主选择，并且从该选择可获取设计器，设计器的谓词添加到此列表。If the selection service offers a primary selection, and a designer can be obtained for that selection from , the designer’s verbs are added to this list. 如果与设计器谓词的名称相冲突的全局谓词的名称，设计器提供的设计器谓词优先。If the name of a global verb conflicts with the name of a designer verb, the designer-provided designer verb takes precedence.
